posts.post_content:
[Confusion In The Ranks](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Confusion In The Ranks) + [Grip of Chaos](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grip of Chaos) + [Enchanted Evening](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Enchanted Evening ) + [Norin The Wary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Norin The Wary) my favorite deck revolves around this (i also throw in [Hive mind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hive mind) and [Eye of the storm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Eye of the storm)) ...it dies alot and very fast but when it goes off...anyone else ever conceded to there own deck?  
  
Awesome card **RUN 5 IN EVERY DECK**

Posted By: FiveEight (6/8/2011 10:43:35 PM)

posts.post_content:
Should have had the type "Human Coward". Then he'd be unable to block [Boldwyr Intimidator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Boldwyr Intimidator). Then again, I doubt Norin would want to block a giant anyway.  
  
Like [Jaya Ballard, Task Mage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jaya Ballard, Task Mage), Norin is one of the evergreen characters of Magic who finally got immortalized in Time Spiral block. And he's the funniest Commander you're likely to play.
posts.html:
Should have had the type "Human Coward". Then he'd be unable to block Boldwyr Intimidator. Then again, I doubt Norin would want to block a giant anyway.

Like Jaya Ballard, Task Mage, Norin is one of the evergreen characters of Magic who finally got immortalized in Time Spiral block. And he's the funniest Commander you're likely to play.

Posted By: Arachnos (9/15/2012 10:55:35 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This card can get pretty serious in actual play. It's a cross between mono-red aggro and affinity. Norin the Wary paired with [Genesis Chamber](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Genesis Chamber) makes a great token engine that can stop some [Birthing Pod](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Birthing Pod) variants cold with the onslaught of Myr tokens. Combine with [Signal Pest](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Signal Pest)s, [Goblin Bushwhacker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Bushwhacker)s, [Memnite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Memnite)s and cards that go back to your hand each turn such as [Archwing Dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Archwing Dragon). [Confusion in the Ranks](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Confusion in the Ranks) RUINS a lot of Modern decks if it can be pulled out quick enough. 4/5 for the best and most reliable EtB trigger in the game but requiring someone to build around him. It's also my favorite creature.
posts.html:
This card can get pretty serious in actual play. It's a cross between mono-red aggro and affinity. Norin the Wary paired with Genesis Chamber makes a great token engine that can stop some Birthing Pod variants cold with the onslaught of Myr tokens. Combine with Signal Pests, Goblin Bushwhackers, Memnites and cards that go back to your hand each turn such as Archwing Dragon. Confusion in the Ranks RUINS a lot of Modern decks if it can be pulled out quick enough. 4/5 for the best and most reliable EtB trigger in the game but requiring someone to build around him. It's also my favorite creature.
